NEXT GENERATION OF FARMERS I recently had the pleasure of joining the Arkansas Farm Bureau for breakfast. It was wonderful to meet with the Young Farmers and Ranchers Committee to discuss the Farm Bill, droughts we've recently experienced in our great state, and inflation's impact on farmers throughout Arkansas.
